alert.note: Alert for Fairfax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 08 at 9:53PM EST until January 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...In Maryland, Prince Georges County. In Virginia, Fairfax County. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning, especially around the time of high tide. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 3 feet above normal. Moderate tidal flooding is possible along the Prince Georges and Fairfax counties coastlines during the Tuesday night high tide cycles.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
